short_description: Explore the ancient wonders and rich culture of Syria, where a blend of Roman, Byzantine, and Islamic influences come together. Marvel at the ancient ruins of Palmyra, stroll through the bustling markets of Damascus, or explore the Crusader castle of Krak des Chevaliers

weather.title: Syria has a Mediterranean climate along the coast, with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters. Inland regions have a more desert-like climate with hotter summers and colder winters

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Scorching temperatures make travel during this period difficult

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and wet weather conditions, with frequent rainfall

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Syria is during the spring months of March to May and the autumn months of September to November when the weather is mild, and you can explore the country's historical sites and cultural heritage comfortably
